description:
Kanade was overwhelmed by Shiseikan High School`s performance, in which they gave their all. She begins the third stage with unsettled feelings, which shows in the way Kanade plays. It`s a crisis for Seiso academy`s ensemble, but Ritsu`s heroic decision to push through guides each member to rise higher. However, Ritsu has a secret he had been keeping from Kanade and Kyoya...
Source: crunchyroll
